name: Kingdom Of Unstability
description:
Lead your kingdom to glory!

But!

You will loose eventually anyway.

You decide how your kingdom grows, which future lies in front.

With each constructed building, you need to choose an event (think of it as a card).

Each new turn will draw the next event from your event-deck which will cause some trouble - or something great.

Manage the stability of your kingdom. If your citizen get uphappy with you, they will do something horrible!

Controls:
  • Mouse-Left - Click on the Elements to activate
  • Mouse-Right - Click to deselect current action
Tutorial:

Construct buildings by choosing events.

Its more or less just resource-management (and luck).

  • Alchemist - Allows you to skip the next event of your Event Deck
  • Witch - Allows you to delete one Event in your Discard Pile
  • Fortune Teller - Allows you to see the next events in your Event Deck
  • Tavern - Here you can "easily" lower the unstability with small events
